name: Chocolate Iced Cap
description: Frosty, filling, and full of flavour! With less sugar, wholesome ingredients, and a full serving of plant-based protein, this blended iced coffee will leave you feeling satisfied.
preparation: 1. In a blender, combine ingredients. If you like it thicker, add ice cubes; for a thinner consistency, add water. Blend until smooth, pour into a tall glass.
